title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Software Modeling Education Design Using Problem-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can visually represent system requirements using UML diagrams (class, sequence, state).
Learners can collaboratively solve software architecture design problems through PBL team projects.
Learners can evaluate the logical consistency of designed models using model verification tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
